metadata.subject: Strange Bedfellows: Culture, Meet Science/Science, Meet Culture

relationships.description: Krauss created and led the Origins Project at Arizona State University
Krauss will work with the directorial team that produced The Unbelievers documentary

analysis.purpose: To propose a television series bringing together cultural icons and scientists for moderated discussions
analysis.significance: High-profile proposal involving numerous celebrities, scientists, and former President Obama for a science-culture discussion series

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion found - this is a straightforward program proposal

illegal_activity.description: No illegal activity discussed - this is a legitimate program proposal

public_knowledge.context: This appears to be a public proposal for a television series involving high-profile celebrities and scientists, likely intended for public distribution

analysis.summary: A proposal for a television series called 'Strange Bedfellows' that would pair cultural icons and celebrities with famous scientists for moderated discussions, with Lawrence Krauss as host and a production budget of $3.18 million for 12 episodes filmed in various locations worldwide.
